name: Game Industry Village
description:
Made for an end year project, during a 3 months long production.

The point was to showcase the members of GameIn; an association which gather the talents around the video games field.

2021

Leader of the project/Game Designer : MERCIER Antonin

Game designers : BA Abdoulaye, GREGORI Athénaïs, BARBARY Hugo

Artists : Marie WELTER,  DESTALMINIL Manon
